about.title: What You Need to Know About DekuSMS
about.description1: is a secure, end-to-end encrypted, open-source SMS messaging application designed to keep your communication private and accessible.
about.description2: DekuSMS is built for privacy-conscious users and those supporting communication freedom worldwide.

endToEnd.title: End-to-End Encryption
endToEnd.desc: Your messages stay secure and private.
endToEnd.more: We ensure encryption at every layerâ€”device, transmission, and server. No one sees your messages except you.

cloudForwarding.title: Cloud Forwarding
cloudForwarding.desc: Access SMS from anywhere in real-time.
cloudForwarding.more: Our system syncs your SMS messages securely with the cloud and gives instant API access for app integration.

smsGateway.title: Custom SMS Gateway
smsGateway.desc: Integrate SMS into your apps easily.
smsGateway.more: DekuSMS offers a flexible API and SDK toolkit, letting developers send and receive SMS through their own logic.

download.title: Download DekuSMS
download.subtitle: Secure, private, and open-source messaging at your fingertips. Get DekuSMS today on your favorite platform.

stayConnected.title: Stay Connected
stayConnected.subscribeText: Subscribe to get the latest updates and offers.
